channel.title: Contributing on GHDL
channel.description: Recent content in Contributing on GHDL

item.description: Contributing The first step might be to use GHDL and explore it's possibilities in an own project. If you are new to VHDL, see the :ref:`USING:QuickStart` for an introduction. Furthermore, we encourage you to read :ref:`USING:Invoking`, where the most commonly used options are explained. You can also check the complete :ref:`REF:Command`. System Message: ERROR/3 (<stdin>, line 7); backlink Unknown interpreted text role "ref". System Message: ERROR/3 (<stdin>, line 7); backlink
